comments.content:
<cite>Charles Andermack, a font designer who works under the nom de lettres Chank Diesel…</cite>

And I always just assumed Chank had a super-cool mom!
I think that’s the first time I’ve seen his real name... Even people who went to school with him only ever knew him as Chank.

Hey, James, as it turns out, the story of Chank’s name is a bit more complicated:

[http://typophile.com/node/46850](http://web.archive.org/web/20081011061758/http:/typophile.com/node/46850 "http://typophile.com/node/46850")

Leave it to Chank and his missus (hello, you two!) to come up with a unique solution. :-)
